name: MidNEROC Household Chemical Waste Drop-Off
materials: Antifreeze; Brake Fluid; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Degreasers; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Fungicides; Gasoline and Unwanted Fuels; Glue & Adhesives; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Latex Paint; Mercury Containing Items; Oil-Based Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Pool Chemicals; Solvents; Transmission Fluid
notes:
Open the 1st and 3rd Sat of each month, April-November.  Member Towns include: Andover, Ashford, Bolton, Chaplin, Columbia, Coventry, Eastford,
Ellington, Mansfield, Tolland, Union, Willington and Windham. If you live in one of the MidNEROC towns, you may bring residential quantities to the facility, for no charge at the facility but bring proof of residency. Small businesses should call to verify eligibility.
